title: Pink Ward Skin Bug
body:
I have the Gentleman Poro Ward and when using regular wards and the base trinket it would be fine. But when a pink was placed down(whether it was from the trinket{{item:3362}} or a normal one{{item:2043}}) Astronaut Poro showed up instead. Just thought it should be known!

Thanks
-ImTheBlackCat

replies.body:
I played with it a bit. 

Here is a picture of a normal {{item:2043}}  and a {{item:3340}}  ward: http://gyazo.com/9efd243ac1826f93aa8144cd26563323

Nothing out of the ordinary as I have the poro ward skin equipped.

This is a picture after I leveled to 9 and upgraded to the {{item:3362}} trinket: http://gyazo.com/3c031d9c560846898570781882daea25

For whatever reason it's showing up as the Battle cast ward skin. I don't even own that ward skin.

Obviously a bug, but I believe it only affects the {{item:3362}} upgrade.
Aw, I only get the Pink ward of the Sad Mummy. He even survived in the tribush behind top tower the entire game. All alone...
Same issue. i was useing mecha ward and when i used the pink ward trinket i ended up with the golden soccar ward....?
This is a known issue and we're investigating! Thanks for the report!
